properties.name: liteflow.enable
properties.description: Whether to turn on liteflow.

properties.name: liteflow.main-executor-class
properties.description: Custom thread pool implement for main executor.

properties.name: liteflow.main-executor-works
properties.description: Max thread count for main executor,only for FlowExecutor.execute2Future.

properties.name: liteflow.monitor.delay
properties.description: Set delay time to print monitor log.

properties.name: liteflow.monitor.enable-log
properties.description: Enable monitor log.

properties.name: liteflow.monitor.period
properties.description: Set period time to print monitor log.

properties.name: liteflow.monitor.queue-limit
properties.description: Set monitor queue size.

properties.name: liteflow.node-executor-class
properties.description: Executor class of node.

properties.name: liteflow.parse-on-start
properties.description: Set whether the rule file needs to be parsed at startup.

properties.name: liteflow.print-banner
properties.description: Whether to print liteflow banner.

properties.name: liteflow.print-execution-log
properties.description: Whether to print logs during execution.

properties.name: liteflow.request-id-generator-class
properties.description: Custom requestId builder.

properties.name: liteflow.retry-count
properties.description: Number of component retries.

properties.name: liteflow.rule-source
properties.description: Location of the flow rule source.

properties.name: liteflow.rule-source-ext-data
properties.description: rule source extended data.

properties.name: liteflow.rule-source-ext-data-map
properties.description: rule source extended data map.

properties.name: liteflow.slot-size
properties.description: Set concurrent data slot size.

properties.name: liteflow.substitute-cmp-class
properties.description: substitute component class.

properties.name: liteflow.support-multiple-type
properties.description: Whether to support multiple types of configuration.

properties.name: liteflow.thread-executor-class
properties.description: Custom thread pool implement for when executor.

properties.name: liteflow.when-max-wait-seconds
properties.description: Set the async thread max wait seconds on " when " mode.

properties.name: liteflow.when-max-workers
properties.description: Set the async thread pool worker max-size on " when " mode.

properties.name: liteflow.when-queue-limit
properties.description: Set the async thread pool queue max-size on " when " mode.
